text: Gonzalagunia pauciflora is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. The specific epithet pauciflora is Latin for 'few- flowered'.Allen J. Coombes D. Gledhill ==References== ==Sources== * pau Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Vulnerable flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Gonzalagunia pauciflora
